EmailTemplate.name: 18-TEPS-Energy-Email-Invite UTC-T00219.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us and your peers in Nokia private workshops at UTC
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Join us and your peers in Nokia private workshops at UTC Charting your path forward 3:00 – 3:55 pm Explore how to integrate machine learning, automation, augmented reality, IoT, and 5G into today’s multi-vendor communications network. Investigate how to do this in a way that securely enables innovation while transitioning communications to support a next gen utility with new business models.
Private LTE Network 4:05 – 5:00 pm Investigate the different options for deploying it today and how these address key use cases driving this solution. Gain insight into how it’s ready for 5G.
Both workshops are scheduled on Tuesday, May 8 at the Renaissance Palm Springs Hotel (adjacent to the convention center), in the Andreas room, and are exclusively for utility personnel.
Please confirm your seat with an email to: Maryann Welsh <[[mailto:maryann.welsh@nokia.com]]>.
For more information on Nokia solutions, visit our webpage <[[https://networks.nokia.com/power-utilities/smart-grid?did=d000000000d9&utm_campaign=utilities_moderniz.&utm_source=email-list-us-contacts&utm_medium=email]]>. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
